name: skifree
description: **Play from Source Code:** 1. Download or clone repository 2. Install [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/) 3. Install [http-server](https://www.npmjs.com/package/http-server): ```npm install http-server -g``` 4. In the \SkiFree directory, run: ```http-server -a localhost -p 8000 -c-1``` 5. Go to [http://localhost:8000/ski.html](http://localhost:8000/ski.html)
